edu.mines.jtk.util

Interface RTree.Boxed

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RTree.Box
    Enclosing class:
    RTree

    public static interface RTree.Boxed
    An N-dimensional object in a box defined by N min/max coordinates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getBounds(float[] min, float[] max)
      Gets the N min/max coordinates for this boxed object.
      float getDistanceSquared(float[] point)
      Gets the distance-squared from this boxed object to a point.

    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        void getBounds(float[] min,
             float[] max)
        Gets the N min/max coordinates for this boxed object. While an object is in an R-tree, these bounds should be constant.
        Parameters:
        min - array to contain N min coordinates.
        max - array to contain N max coordinates.

      • getDistanceSquared

        float getDistanceSquared(float[] point)
        Gets the distance-squared from this boxed object to a point. Note: this distance is typically not the same as the distance from the boxed object's bounds to the point. Rather, it is the distance from the object within those bounds.
        Parameters:
        point - array of N point coordinates.
        Returns:
        the distance-squared.
